View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  0 D A review by Dan_Tebasco  7.0 Written by  Dan_Tebasco  on May 19, 2017 Fairly amusing ghosthunter show. It's in the lines of Ghost Adventures or any other paranormal show, the difference is that the team in this don't take themselves as uber seriously as they do in some other shows. Which is not a bad thing, many of these shows do take themselves way too seriously so it's a breath of fresh air in that regard. They play a bit on their 'blackness' but not to the point that it gets annoying or anything, I've read reviews on other site saying they make a mockery of ghost hunting. I disagree about that, and at least they don't obviously fake as much stuff as o...  read the rest.
